Short description of your event: How should DeFi and CeFi build the future of finance together or sign up for a no-win fight ?
Long description of your event:
To end the first day of Liscon what better than a panel on burning topic a cocktail by the hand ?

-How should DeFi and CeFi build the future of finance together or sign up for a no-win fight ?

Custody, real world DeFi, White labelling, ... No taboos, we are all here for the tech !

Short description of your event: Panel on scaling DeFi from a niche market for degens to a mass market that benefits everyone
Long description of your event: DeFi is growing exponentially and has the potential to give financial freedom to billions of people. But it's also completely overwhelming, even for degens: too much complexity, too many interfaces, too many risks. Join our panel for an open discussion on how we design new tools and systems to make DeFi more accessible, so people spend less time trying to figure out how and what to invest in, and more time reaping the benefits of DeFi.
Speaker(s): SimpleFi, StakeDAO, Celo, Polygon and Angle Protocol
Sponsor(s): TRGC, SimpleFi, StakeDAO, Celo, Polygon and Angle Protocol
Address: Mercado de Ribeira, Avenida 24 de Julho, 1200-479 Lisbon

Short description of your event: For the morrow has no place for rules and diet.
Long description of your event:
"As the game comes to a close, finish line in sight,

The champions must suffer the dawn, as they brave the light.

But fear not you who has been chosen,

As the brunchpool, not unlike safe haven

Will bring to you much deserved feast and quiet

For the morrow has no place for rules and diet.

More infos are coming ... Apes are bringing the alpha leak

Brunchpool by Blackpool, Centrifuge & OVR"

Long description of your event:
Blackpool, Stake DAO & Centrifuge have come together to host an NFT charity auction.

They have decided to bring together successful NFT projects and ask them to put up a unique NFT for sale, which will exist solely for this event and the proceeds will be distributed in whole or in part to charity.

For details you will have to come or connect to the Blackpool twitch channel. The auction will be accessible to live listeners as well.

Blackpool

Satoshi Studio

Cometh

So Rare

Solid NFT

No panels or presentations: just drinks, music, food and awesome people.

Join us in the outdoor bar, followed by late night tunes by Tolga Fidan in the speakeasy.

Short description of your event: Surfing with like minded crypto enthusiast.
Long description of your event: What we do requires grueling hours in front of the screen. I've always enjoyed getting out in nature at least once a day for an hour or so, just for a nice reset. I see this as the start of a sub-community of blockchain and crypto enthusiast who are passionate about surfing - and a great kickoff to the conference.

Hosted by DXdao, this event will include a panel discussion and presentation around prediction markets, followed by happy hour. We will provide the drinks!

Reach out on Discord if you need to contact us.

Short description of your event: The decentralized after parties hosted by locals.
Long description of your event: DeNites are decentralized after parties to showcase local web3 projects and startups in the most entertaining and fun way possible. We believe lasting connections happen when you're having fun, not by attending conferences. After 18 months of hiding in our homes, it's time for web3 founders, builders and creators to meet IRL and create stronger bonds.

Title of your event: Blockchain and Metaverse: reimagine the future 1
Short description of your event: The metaverse is a concept of a persistent, online, 3D universe that combines multiple virtual spaces. How does blockchain technology enable transparent and reliable governance systems here, and where does crypto fit into the space?
Long description of your event:
The metaverse is a concept of a persistent, online, 3D universe that combines multiple different virtual spaces. You can think of it as a future iteration of the internet. The metaverse will allow users to work, meet, game, and socialize together in these 3D spaces.

The metaverse isn‚Äôt fully in existence, but some platforms contain metaverse-like elements. Video games currently provide the closest metaverse experience on offer. Developers have pushed the boundaries of what a game is through hosting in-game events and creating virtual economies.

Although not required, cryptocurrencies can be a great fit for a metaverse. They allow for creating a digital economy with different types of utility tokens and virtual collectibles (NFTs). The metaverse would also benefit from the use of crypto wallets, such as Trust Wallet and MetaMask. Also, blockchain technology can provide transparent and reliable governance systems.

Blockchain, metaverse-like applications already exist and provide people with liveable incomes. Axie Infinity is one play-to-earn game that many users play to support their income. SecondLive and Decentraland are other examples of successfully mixing the blockchain world and virtual reality apps.

During this invitation-only networking event, we‚Äôll include industry gurus in blockchain, crypto and gaming, XR to reimagine the future together.
Lisbon: R. Rodrigo da Fonseca 2, 1250-191 Lisboa, Portugal
Speaker(s): Epic Games, Unity, Niantic, TikTok, Ubisoft

Title of your event: Full Time Token Holder by PieDAO
Short description of your event: Prepare-se para a festa, or in other words get ready to party! Join PieDAO as we celebrate the launch of PieDAO staking & governance mining!
Long description of your event:
PieDAO community is hosting its first ever Lisbon festa around EthLisbon, and we have a reason to celebrate!

With our launch of Staking & Governance mining, the concept of work will never feel the same. From now you can sit back, govern PieDAO, get your monthly cashflows, and... come party with us in Lisbon!

And to help you get into the mood, we'll be giving away #FullTimeTokenHolder must-haves like our limited-edition Ray Dalio sunglesses, flip flops, beach bags, and tank tops.

RSVP to make sure you don't miss your spot!
Lisbon: The Flat, Cal√ßada Ribeiro Santos 37 1¬∫ andar, 1200-769 Lisboa
Address: The Flat, Cal√ßada Ribeiro Santos 37 1¬∫ andar, 1200-769 Lisboa

Long description of your event:
Rendezvous at the Polkastarter Warehouse, in Santos, Lisboa, and get your party faces and attires on to celebrate a warm October night in the beautiful Portuguese capital. Besides guaranteeing for good vibes and spicy beats (courtesy of our DJ), you can also count on us for best-in-class spirits, an atmosphere worthy of your attendance and splendid company.
Come for the crypto and stay for the 'and more'.
Lisbon: J9A Warehouse, 18-20, Jardim 9 de Abril, 1200-736 Lisboa
Address: J9A Warehouse, 18-20, Jardim 9 de Abril, 1200-736 Lisboa

Short description of your event: BlackPool‚Äôs brunch is back! Earn yourself a seat at the table (& many other NFTs) during the BlackPool x OVR Sca(n)venger hunt !
Long description of your event:
OVR and BlackPool join forces for a high-stakes treasure hunt!

As you may know, the BrunchPool will take place on the 22nd of October at 11h30 following the Liscon conference and this time, we want to complete our table with degens such as yourselves! We decided to complete our madlad guestlist with an additional 15 spots to be won by conference attendees during a city-scale augmented-reality scavenger hunt! To do so, we at BlackPool are delighted to be joined by our friends and partners from OVR!

To enter the game, you will first have to find a QR code to scan, thus marking the beginning of your hunt! You will then be given a detailed set of rules, instructions and‚Ä¶ riddles. Brain yourself into gathering BlackPool‚Äôs 7 artifacts and join us to a feast for the ages! The hunt will last for 36h covering the whole conference, from October 20th, 9 am, to October 21th, 9pm.

But fear not you who will be gone before the BrunchPool, for many NFTs will be distributed! Partners have joined the experience with a second hunt running in parallel to BrunchPool treasure hunt. Over the same period of time, gather as many artifacts as you can from projects such as Cometh, Ethernaal, or Centrifuge, etc., scattered across Lisbon and compete for a wide range of valuable NFTs! Some will be earned with sweat, some will be earned with luck, all will be memorable

Short description of your event: Host a private dinner with likeminded people
Long description of your event: Host a private and exclusive dinner one of the evenings of blockchain week Lisbon to connect and network with people in the same industry where we could all benefit from each other

Data Availability and Rollups - Building a Modular Blockchain Stack

Learn about how rollups and data availability layers form the basis of a new modular paradigm for blockchain architecture

The combination of rollups and data availability layers create a new modular blockchain technology stack. This new paradigm promises advantages in scaling, flexibility and interoperability for decentralized apps.

Come learn about this exciting new frontier from the teams building it ‚Äî Starkware, Celestia and Fuel.
Address: Cal√ßada Ribeiro Santos 37, 1200-769 Lisboa, Portugal

Long description of your event:
An evening for Molecule and VitaDAO members & guests to connect, network and celebrate the year's success.

Molecule and VitaDAO are celebrating the establishment of the world's first biotech DAO as well as the development of the first IP/NFT system. Unfortunately this is a limited capacity event with no tickets on sale. However, if you have a passion for the intersection of Web3.0 and the pharmaceutical industry please apply using the google form.
Address: R. Ant√≥nio Maria Cardoso, 1200-484 Lisboa, Portugal

Title of your event: PsyDAO: Exploring the intersection of Web3.0 and psychedelic research
Short description of your event: A think tank of Web3.0 thought leaders, VC's and entrepreneurs investigating the future of blockchain and psychedelic research.
Long description of your event: Leaders in the Web3.0 space, VC's and like-minded individuals will be hosting an evening of networking and ideation around the development of PsyDAO. A decentralised autonomous organisation that looks to facilitate the development of novel therapeutics aimed at mental health ailments. Conversation will be facilitated around the potentials of such a DAO and the development of open source psychedelic R&D.

Title of your event: OpenDeFi x ArtDAO Exhibition & Party @ Boa Labs
Short description of your event: Join Open DeFi and ArtDAO as we celebrate Lisbon blockchain week with an immersive exhibition featuring live art, NFTs and A.I exhibits from our artists alongside music from Cleison Monteiro & Pedro Rodrigues, Weselle, Johanna Schnieder & more.
Long description of your event:
Open DeFi and ArtDAO collaborate to celebrate Lisbon blockhain week with an immersive exhibition & party at Boa Labs in downtown Chiado. Come and join us for drinks as we party to music from Cleison Monteiro & Pedro Rodrigues, Weselle and Johanna Schnieder alongside entrancing art exhibits, live paintings and A.I creations from ArtDAOs artists. 

Special Event: We will be auctioning off one of the first physical NFTs, powered by Mattereum.

We respond within 48h.

Title of your event: Rollups and Data Availability - Building a Modular Blockchain Stack
Short description of your event: Learn about the frontier of scaling via rollups and data availability from the teams building it ‚Äî Starkware, Celestia, Fuel and Offchain Labs.
Long description of your event:
The combination of rollups and data availability layers creates a new modular blockchain technology stack. This new paradigm promises advantages in scalability, flexibility and interoperability for decentralized apps.

Come learn about this exciting new frontier from the teams building it ‚Äî Starkware, Celestia, Fuel and Offchain Labs. The event features presentations from each team followed by a panel and refreshments.

Schedule:
17:00 : Venue opens
17:30 - 18:30 : Team presentations
18:30 - 19:00 : Panel
19:00 - 20:00 : Refreshments

Speakers:
Mustafa Al-Bassam, Co-founder of Celestia Labs
Avihu Levy, Head of Product at Starkware Industries
John Adler, Co-founder of Fuel Labs
Fred Lacs, Software Engineer at Offchain Labs

Short description of your event: Join the Women in Blockchain Dinner at the start of Liscon & ETHLisbon to get connect ahead of the conference.
Long description of your event:
Join the Women in Blockchain Dinner at the start of Liscon & ETHLisbon to get connect ahead of the conference.
There were way more sign ups than we anticipated which is amazing, however, we are too many for a normal restaurant now.
Therefore we searched all over Lisbon and secured an amazing venue with a caterer. Because we have limited spots and need to pay the caterer based on attendees, please buy your ticket before Weds.Since there is no sponsor for this event, everybody pays for themselves.
We managed to negotiate a price of ‚Ç¨25 which includes dinner (veg & non veg) and drinks (alc and non alc). Please note that we are not making any profit from this, we are just passing along the cost of catering.

Short description of your event: We'll be hosting a very special event in Lisbon, at Heden Santa Apolonia to celebrate all of the achievements of the Filecoin network ‚Äî and look ahead to what‚Äôs coming next!
Long description of your event:
It‚Äôs hard to believe, but the Filecoin network has been in orbit for a year already, following the highly anticipated Filecoin Mainnet Liftoff on October 15th, 2020.

Recently, Filecoin storage providers surpassed 12 exbibytes (EiB) of global, decentralized storage capacity, equivalent to 190 Internet Archives, 45,000 Wikipedias, and 6,850,000 years worth of video calls!

Short description of your event: Join us for a stroll through the lovely streets of Lisbon. We'll get to meet the city and each other during a short walk.
Long description of your event:
GM to all degens,

after several days of drinks, partying and networking, it's finally time to do something healthy.

Join us for a stroll through the lovely streets of Lisbon. We'll get to meet the city and each other during a short walk on Thursday afternoon.

Let's meet at the entrance of Convento do Carmo at 2:00 pm on Thursday (21st of October) and we'll walk towards Jardim da Cerca da Graca.

We can stop for a snack or a drink if needed :)

We strongly recommend joining this telegram chat, we'll be sharing the live location throughout the walk in case anybody gets lost: https://t.me/joinchat/hEeKFEe1e5MwYmI8

Looking forward to walking with you all!
